page.title: 06A Typical Sunday
page.content: I get up at about 9:00 and have my breakfast. I have a waffle, a cup of tea and some biscuits. When I've finished breakfast I get dressed and watch television. Afterwards I go to the shop to get lemonade for my granny and comics for my brother. When I come home I have my dinner and read the comics. When I've finished my dinner I go out to play "Kerbie". At 4:30 I go in for tea. After tea I go out to play Kerbie or Football. At 9:00 I go in to watch television. After that at 10:00 I go to bed.
